text: Pkg/PCG Files, PMP Files and Test Files are supported and uploaded to the server by using "Upload" button in the top left of the screen. In the list of documents that appear below the selected documents you can view and select a document as well. This will provide copies of your documents as confidential attachments on your computer. Please note that these copies will not be accessible from any other location than your computer, and they will not be visible to anyone else.
